name: Looking for Dread Mac Farlane
description:
Point-and-click adventure game set in the Dread Mac Farlane universe.

Help Marie, the descendant of the pirate Dread Mac Farlane, to track down her ancestor to take her back to Neverland and help her put an end to the bloody war between Peter Pan and Captain Hook...

Graphics created with Plotagon. Scripted with Adventure Game Studio.

Size: 247 MB

Creator: Marion Poinsot, based on her graphic novel. English translation by Paolo.

****
DOWNLOAD THE ENGLISH VERSION : http://marionpoinsot.fr/jeux/pirates/lookingfordread.zip

OTHER VERSIONS :
- English Linux version : http://marionpoinsot.fr/jeux/pirates/lookingfordread_linux.zip
- French version : https://shai-la.itch.io/a-la-recherche-de-dread-mac-farlane
